name: DARK HOT POT
description:
Boil or be boiled!
煮るか煮られるか！ Tofu eat Tofu!
食うか食われるか！ This is a soulslike 3D action game where you have to put Voxel Enemies into a pot!
Voxelエネミーを鍋にぶち込んでいく、闇鍋系ソウルライク３Dアクションゲームです！ Features: Super Simple　超シンプル

All you have to do is throw the Enemies into the pot!
ルールは簡単。エネミーを鍋にぶち込め！

No boring movies, explanations or conversation scenes!
だるいムービーとか会話シーンとか皆無！

So it can be played quickly and easily in a short time!
気軽に初めてサクッとプレイできる良い感じのボリューム！

But Exciting　でもエキサイティング

The funny Voxel Enemies are coming to boil you for real!
Voxelエネミーは本気であなたを煮込みにきます！

You may be boiled over and over again. But the experience will be exciting and fun!
何度もエネミーに煮込まれるかも…、でもそれもまた一興！

Controls:

[Gamepad]

  • L Stick : Move
  • R Stick : Camera
  • R1/R/RB : Attack
  • R2/ZR/RT : Strong Attack
  • ×/B or ○/A : Dodge Roll

[Mouse & Keyboard]

  • WASD/Arrow : Move
  • Mouse : Camera
  • MLB : Attack
  • Shift+MLB : Strong Attack
  • Space : Dodge Roll

If you like it, I would be glad to get your rating, follow-up, feedback, etc!
もし「ふ～ん、おもしれーゲーム…」と思ってくれたら、評価やフォロー、感想などもらえると嬉しいです！
